title: After Being Marked, I Have a Baby - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childcare   Cute Children   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Generals   Heartwarming   Hidden Abilities   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Modern Day   Omegaverse   Pregnancy   Short Story   Single Parent   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World   Virtual Reality
author: 笑蓝
description:
Ling Xinmi, a single mother, after raising her child for four years, saw two beautiful NPCs in the new virtual reality game that resembled her own daughter. One was her own contracted maid and the other is the ruler of the game world. The Queen!

Maid: Master, why is your scent so fragrant and soft, come, let me hug and kiss~  ≥﹏≤

Queen: I’m tyrannous, domineering cold-hearted and merciless!>
